projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
We got notified that if our definition file keeps growing, it could lead to issues with the GitHub API. In order to resolve this we should split the generated typings up into separated files, for example for each module like `ui.d.ts`, `platform.d.ts` etc.

See https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/issues/46029
fields.summary: TypeScript: Split up definition into multiple files
